about_the_game:
Bonoru Adventures

welcome. Dear gamers
Bonoru Adventures
Become a "bonoru" (water deer) and complete your mission to reach the hidden destination.


Game Features
Get hit by a car in the tutorial? bonoru (water deer) wakes up in a suspicious map
Through dialogue during the game, you can learn why the elk is hated by the farmer.

gameplay
Discover hidden destinations while listening to exciting music and talking to NPCs.
Avoid enemies and reach the next stage by jumping and teleporting.



operation keys
The game simply uses arrow keys and WASD as movement keys.
Space key is jump key
Eat 10 carrots and press the right mouse button to teleport.


TMI
Although it is a protected species worldwide, it is a harmful species in Korea.
The story of Bonoru the water deer.
I tried it as a casual, death run, and platform game.
Why are they hated, and why do they do what they do?
You can learn it by talking to NPCs.
There are also tricks for each stage.
Play it and reach the correct destination.

name: Bonoru Adventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 1090
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 7900 12-Core Processor 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Although it is a protected species worldwide, it is a harmful species in its own korea. The story of Bonoru, the water deer. I tried it as a casual former death, a platform game. space jump Arrow keys (wasd) movement Right mouse button special ability
